pageProps.articleContent:
Features

  • CRUD operations
  • Responsiveness
  • Beautiful animations
  • Image slider

Built with

  • Programming language - Typescript
  • Front-end library - Reactjs
  • UI components - Chakra UI
  • Animation library - Framer Motion
  • Notes display - react-stack-grid
  • Forms Validation - React hook form
  • Images placeholder - blurhash
  • Progressive image loading - react-progressive-image
  • Icons - react icons

Demo Link: Notebook GitHub Repo: Repo

blogDetails.title: Create a Notebook app with React, ChakraUi, and framerMotion
blogDetails.description: Features    CRUD operations Responsiveness Beautiful animations Image slider           ...
blogDetails.body_html:
Features

  • CRUD operations
  • Responsiveness
  • Beautiful animations
  • Image slider

Built with

  • Programming language - Typescript
  • Front-end library - Reactjs
  • UI components - Chakra UI
  • Animation library - Framer Motion
  • Notes display - react-stack-grid
  • Forms Validation - React hook form
  • Images placeholder - blurhash
  • Progressive image loading - react-progressive-image
  • Icons - react icons

Demo Link: Notebook
GitHub Repo: Repo
blogDetails.body_markdown:
# Features
- CRUD operations
- Responsiveness
- Beautiful animations
- Image slider

# Built with
- Programming language - [Typescript](https://www.typescriptlang.org/)
- Front-end library - [Reactjs](https://reactjs.org/)
- UI components - [Chakra UI](https://chakra-ui.com)
- Animation library - [Framer Motion](https://www.framer.com/motion/)
- Notes display - [react-stack-grid](https://github.com/tsuyoshiwada/react-stack-grid)
- Forms Validation - [React hook form](https://react-hook-form.com/)
- Images placeholder - [blurhash](https://www.framer.com/motion/)
- Progressive image loading - [react-progressive-image](https://github.com/FormidableLabs/react-progressive-image)
- Icons - [react icons](https://react-icons.github.io/react-icons/)

**Demo Link:** [Notebook](https://ma-ahmad.github.io/notebook)
**GitHub Repo:** [Repo](https://github.com/MA-Ahmad/notebook)
